body:
Last year on the 24/9/15 I got handpicked by Jozz (you babe) and I  got Media! I have had Media for a year now.
AMA Time!!!
body_tagged:
Last year on the 24/9/15 I got handpicked by Jozz (you babe) and I  got Media! I have had Media for a year now.
AMA Time!!!
title: [AMA] 1 Year of Media!

replies.body:
Yay, good job mate.
AFL or NRL? 
What do you enjoy particularly about being media?
replies.body_tagged:
Yay, good job mate.
AFL or NRL? 
What do you enjoy particularly about being media?

replies.body:
NRL! I watch the highlights on Sport I don't have the attention span or time to sit and watch people kick balls for like 80 minutes.
What I enjoy about being Media would be that I like to live stream (when I have no internet at the moment) but I loved live streaming and hanging out with the community and creating content for the community.

Best match I think I have ever streamed? Well I have only streamed about 4 times. I would think it would have to be the Staff Mega Scrim. 

I haven't really seen you around or talked to you that much but you are preety cool.

replies.body: Junr. You babe. Your awesome to talk to (whenever you have your mic on) and awesome to play avicus with (whenever I have Internet)

replies.body:
I have seen you online sometimes and you're good to talk to (also we are in the same team).
South Korea, I'd say I would never go there. I have heard Korea is not the safest place.
Favourite moment about Media is that I love to live stream for the community (when it's either a Public Match Live stream or a Tourney)

replies.body:
I haven't really seen you on or have had any interaction with you at all (I don't think)
The community at the moment is good I like the community and talking to the community (seeing is through right now I can only access the forums) I still like talking to the community.
DubbleDutchLand... never heard of the guy before. Guessing that you're talking about YouTube... I don't watch YouTube that much for one and also I have no internet to watch it with.

replies.body:
How did I find out about Avicus? I and some friends were looking for a server to record on and (I hope I get tagging right)  FatherHurl and  LemonLime_x showed myself and  Glesmon Avicus that they have been playing on for a while. On my old terminated channel I recorded and uploaded Avicus at least once a week. Those were the days...

Colour: Blue
Food: at the moment... Potato Bake
Animal: Dog
Opinions on Avicus? Ehhh could be better...
Opinions on Sealand? Never heard of it...
Opinions on me? You're good at Avicus (smash me everytime) a growing YouTube Channel and I want to see it grow more the better you make your content. Other than that awesome.

Thanks
